# body

**Instance Property**

A rectangular view that’s filled with the shape style.

## Declaration

```swift
var body: _ShapeView<Rectangle, Self> { get }
```

## Discussion

For a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ShapeStyle] that also conforms to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View] protocol, like [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Color] or [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/LinearGradient], this default implementation of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/body-8kl5o] property provides a visual representation for the shape style. As a result, you can use the shape style in a view hierarchy like any other view:

```swift
ZStack {
    Color.cyan
    Text("Hello!")
}
.frame(width: 200, height: 50)
```
